V.iii.7.2.d
.
Definition:  Nephritis
Nephritis
is generally defined as inflammation of the kidneys.  It includes inflammation of any renal structure such as glomeruli, tubules, or interstitial tissue. Nephritis is a form of nephropathy.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 7 - Genitourinary Disabilities
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 7, Section None
